metadata.title: CVE-2022-48916 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:iommu/vt-d: Fix double list_add when enabling VMD in scalable modeWhen enabling VMD and IOMMU scalable mode, the following kernel paniccall trace/kernel log is shown in Eagle Stream platform (Sapphire RapidsCPU) during booting:pci 0000:59:00.5: Adding to iommu group 42...vmd 0000:59:00.5: PCI host bridge to bus 10000:80pci
